questions.quote: I try to take a vacation, I come back, the whole operation's a shambles.  Hello.
He knows I'm waiting. He sees me. He just doesn't wanna look.
I'm still big. It's the bootlegs that got small. So how are things at the office? Back to normal?
Jerry, this is not a crush. This is a complete fixation. he makes me very uncomfortable.
What's the deal with lampshades? I mean if it's a lamp, why do you want shade?
My God! I can't believe the other guy's going to be on the show!
You better zip up.  I couldn't get the top on the convertible up.
And I'm her protégé. You must have someone like that. You know, who guides you in your career path.
All my life I've dreamed of sitting front row, behind the dugout!
Hey, Silvio, just out for a little stroll in my favorite fur coat.
